name: Make a set of Iron Tools
goal: Craft a full set of iron tools
notes: Use (params.count) to determine what 'X' item count should be.

steps.title: Craft Iron Pickaxe
steps.details: Using a crafting_table, craft 'X' amount of iron_pickaxe (3 iron_ingot + 2 stick per pickaxe). (Recommended for pipeline: 1 iron pickaxe).

steps.title: Craft Iron Sword
steps.details: Using a crafting_table, craft 'X' amount of iron_sword (2 iron_ingot + 1 stick per sword). (Recommended for pipeline: 1 iron sword).

steps.title: Craft Iron Axe
steps.details: Using a crafting_table, craft 'X' amount of iron_axe (3 iron_ingot + 2 stick per axe). (Recommended for pipeline: 1 iron axe).

steps.title: Craft Iron Shovel
steps.details: Using a crafting_table, craft 'X' amount of iron_shovel (1 iron_ingot + 2 stick per shovel). (Recommended for pipeline: 1 iron shovel).
